This is an example of bold.
This is an example of Italic.
This is an example of Underline.
This is an example of Strike.
(CO 2) This is an example of Subscript.
(E=MC 2) This is an example of Superscript.
This is an example of Big.
This is an example of Small.
This is an example of Strong.
This is an example of Sample.
This is an example of Teletype.
( U.N.O United Nations Organization.) This is an example of Abbreviation.
( x is a variable.)This is an example of Variable
( Computer code text.) This is an example of Code.
